_header: Father and Son and Holy Ghost / Great God in Trinity
_description: ‘Parce michi Domine’ — six quatrains with this refrain

BodAsh189.First Lines:
FAdyr & son & holy gostGrete god
                    intrinite…
BodAsh189.Last Lines:
…Lorde haue mynde of manys careParce michi
                    Domine
BodAsh189.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 210-11.
